name: Vikram Shah
summary_blurb: Vikram Shah is an experienced Investment Analyst with a focus on the Technology sector. He has a strong background in fundamental research and financial analysis, having worked with notable firms such as Cinctive Capital Management and Goldman Sachs. His expertise includes developing tactical trading strategies and conducting comprehensive financial modeling.
education_highlight: B.S. in Business Administration from Northwestern University - Kellogg School of Management
